buildSpec:
version: 1
applications:
  - appRoot: hermes-dispatch/dispatcher-console
    frontend:
      phases:
        preBuild:
          commands:
            - cd hermes-dispatch/dispatcher-console
            - npm ci
        build:
          commands:
            - npm run build
      artifacts:
        baseDirectory: hermes-dispatch/dispatcher-console/.next
        files:
          - '**/*'
      cache:
        paths:
          - hermes-dispatch/dispatcher-console/node_modules/**/*
          - hermes-dispatch/dispatcher-console/.next/cache/**/*
